comment: Dr V is the few people in the world that would give her shirt of her back and who would want wants everyone to succeed. At first, I was unsure. Her approach was different then I was use too in terms of exams, every class “quizzes” etc. But she will make you feel comfortable and you will learn! She's 100! Highly recommend.

Professor V definitely knows her stuff. The class was online and had lecture quizzes due each week. VERY LECTURE HEAVY. Lecture were super long and no powerpoints uploaded for you. Several other random assignments besides quizzes. Tests are EXTREMELY LONG. It would take the full two hours each test. A lot of short-response paragraph long questions.

Dr. V is by far the best professor in the exercise science department. Her innovative teaching ability keeps the lectures worth attending. She knows how to talk to students and keep them involved. Clinical Ex was easy with her. 3 tests, 1 final, 3 lab reports. Just read the ppts and attend class and you'll get an A. Super interesting class!

Dr. V is absolutely amazing. I really wish I would have had her for more classes. Go class, take notes, and study. She knows the material well and knows how to explain it. Test are mostly short answer but which sounds crazy at first, but trust me, she points out what you need to know ahead of time. I never studies unnecessary material. A gem.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Class at 8:00 AM has never been so good. Dr. VanDusseldorp is a nutrition rockstar. Not just sports nutrition, but general nutrition. I feel lucky to have had her for this class. Its extremely obvious she loves students and centers her lectures on us. Thumbs up Dr. V. Second the donut comment. Love em'.

Her tests are based on her study guide and are short answer, so you actually need to know what you're talking about. She is an easy grader, so if you are in the ballpark, she will give the points for it. There is a project at the end, and as long as you have everything she requires, she honestly doesn't care how unhealthy it is. also Loves donuts

DR. V IS AMAZING! Her classes are not difficult, but you do learn a lot more than a normal class. She is so entertaining in her lectures each class is really fun and interesting. I have learned more than I ever would from another professor about nutrition. She helps you learn a lot without stressing.
Great lectures. Great topics. Dr. V knows her stuff.

Best professor I've had at KSU. She makes you work for you grade but I have never learned so much in 1 class because she makes you know it inside and out. She is very fair and doesn't try to trick you on tests. Amazing professor and amazing class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Amazing lectures

comment: Taking this class over the summer. Lots of notes/additional info given during lecture. Go to class and you will do just fine. Dr. VanDusseldorp also helped me a lot with my resume for PT school. She cares about your success in and out of the classroom. Take her class if you get the option, you'll love it.  Her exams are mostly short answer btw.

Dr. V is BY FAR the best professor I have had at KSU. She is extremely intelligent and is always keeping up to date with new research and information in the field. Along with this, she makes every class fun due to her high energy and charisma and makes everything easy to understand. She does a great job of making hard concepts easy. TAKE HER CLASS!
Dr. VanDusseldorp is the best. Tells it how it is. Straightforward. Funny. You will learn for sure.

4300 and  3900: Dr. V kills in the classroom. She is the most charismatic person I have ever met. She is also super smart, has no ego and really cares about every student's success. Her lectures are great. If you don't go to class, you will likely miss important info for exams. Highly recommend any class she teaches.

I had Dr. VanDusseldorp for both Phys of Ex 1 and Sports Nutrition.  By far the best instructor to date I have had at KSU. Dr. VanDusseldorp's range of knowledge if extensive. She is passionate about teaching and really cares about all of the students. I met with her outside of class multiple times to discuss my future career path, too. Top prof.
Dr. V is amazing! Highly recommend any class with her (she teaches nutrition and sports nutrition also).
